SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="ed032d1e984f4f93a5045bbbeeb922f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm quite sure I'll be able to cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]though I'll need cells from a dog whose
tail is not a leaf.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ed032d1e984f4f93a5045bbbeeb922f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If you're able to acquire these, please
bring them to me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll whip up a cure
right away.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="4690a46e1691446ea86ad47c5f47e9d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hello,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Although, I suppose it's
a bit late for introductions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4690a46e1691446ea86ad47c5f47e9d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm so grateful to you for saving
us.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's important I say this to you directly:
thank you so,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so very much.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="d9ea6ce773ed483892df6799631e3485" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Ah, you look like you're feeling good![etc:Wait frame="15"/] But if
you start feeling bad,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I want you to come
straight to me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="7251baad9e4f41b4936457fc601f3d59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Do you have any interest in treasure
hunting?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do come talk
to me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] won't you?
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="99164966c95e44aaa6946e9664985ef5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Since we crashed on this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my main
source of food has been the juice that's
made out of that shining extract.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99164966c95e44aaa6946e9664985ef5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You see, it contains many enzymes that
help rid the body of fatigue.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's also quite
tasty, so what's not to love?
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="301ea1cb8a724d7ebfde65cdadbf6855" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By nature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we Koppaites have a hearty
appetite.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But members of my family tree...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we're ravenous—with a capital R—eaters.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="301ea1cb8a724d7ebfde65cdadbf6855" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]That's my way of saying,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "When do I get
to eat next?!"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Mmm-mmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what I wouldn't
give for some extra-spicy grilled fruit.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="dbd895435f4e41c2a8cf6982e005f739" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]how should we deal with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
when we finally catch up to him?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dbd895435f4e41c2a8cf6982e005f739" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]Perhaps we should sit him down and have
a very looong talk with him about treating
food with the respect it deserves.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="efeadca9a9a44ef080e6c2f9ec20ca56" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My main goal here is to collect treasure.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That's why I'm working with those two in
the first place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="efeadca9a9a44ef080e6c2f9ec20ca56" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So when it comes right down to it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I am
prepared to leave them behind if I have to.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="efeadca9a9a44ef080e6c2f9ec20ca56" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Though...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]if I did lose track of them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it'd
probably be more trouble than it's worth.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'd likely wind up helping them out.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="7693060997fd443080243806721d1f3a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]What I'm doing isn't all that different
from what other veterinarians do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7693060997fd443080243806721d1f3a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I treat animals and publish papers now
and then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Really,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm not as
interesting as all that.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="3734871ecc2641a68f894a23f2312534" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm told that many of the spaceships we
use on Koppai were designed by [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s
grandfather.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3734871ecc2641a68f894a23f2312534" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That's probably why [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is so good with
machines,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just like his younger brother...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
His thirteenth younger brother,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I mean.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="a008dd5f15d8413fb9d6e83d7b9d2b8c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] got that scar on his brow during his
time as a ranger.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He says that Ducky
"got him real good."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a008dd5f15d8413fb9d6e83d7b9d2b8c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]If I was going to guess,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd bet that he and
Ducky smacked their heads together while
lunging for the same piece of food.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="5723c8f73f444540a6aaa253005d72ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]What will I do with the treasure once I find
it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll sell it and invest the proceeds.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5723c8f73f444540a6aaa253005d72ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Of late, there's been a lot of research put
into finding plants that can be cultivated
on Koppai.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a very hot field right now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5723c8f73f444540a6aaa253005d72ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Koppai hasn't had any agriculture to speak
of,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you see.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So it would be very exciting to
get in on the ground floor now.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="07659f6850ed46c095c209094c02dc91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] started out as a solo treasure
hunter.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It wasn't until later that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
began helping him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="07659f6850ed46c095c209094c02dc91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm sure he must have seen his fair share
of danger when he was on his own.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="5c88080f8d8a4193b0086150d6a1f6b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I had never seen the dog that kidnapped
me before![etc:Wait frame="15"/] But honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wasn't very
frightened.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5c88080f8d8a4193b0086150d6a1f6b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]How do I put it...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when it snatched me
up,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it felt as if I was being played with.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like I was a toy or something.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="b73df15f1a2e4ddd9258c0af20d4b063" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Since we crashed on this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my main
source of food has been the juice that's
made out of that shining extract.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b73df15f1a2e4ddd9258c0af20d4b063" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You see, it contains many enzymes that
help rid the body of fatigue.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's also quite
tasty, so what's not to love?
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="e06363863c044e9abcd97f82609acc21" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By nature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we Koppaites have a hearty
appetite.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But members of my family tree...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we're ravenous—with a capital R—eaters.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e06363863c044e9abcd97f82609acc21" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]That's my way of saying,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "When do I get
to eat next?!"[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Mmm-mmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what I wouldn't
give for some extra-spicy grilled fruit.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="9bccf656edde4bba8871a19a54211d4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]My main goal here is to collect treasure.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
That's why I'm working with those two in
the first place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9bccf656edde4bba8871a19a54211d4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So when it comes right down to it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I am
prepared to leave them behind if I have to.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9bccf656edde4bba8871a19a54211d4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Though...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]if I did lose track of them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it'd
probably be more trouble than it's worth.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'd likely wind up helping them out.
SV027.SV027_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="db6b9b7594ed487fae3c75feee509840" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]What I'm doing isn't all that different
from what other veterinarians do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="db6b9b7594ed487fae3c75feee509840" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I treat animals and publish papers now
and then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Really,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm not as
interesting as all that.
